name: h3
description: The 2026 Victus Vibe Pro-Crayon Tatis Pink Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat is expertly crafted for young athletes seeking performance and style. Featuring a vibrant purple and blue colorway, this bat proudly displays the authentic signature of Fernando Tatis Jr. on its barrel, adding a touch of major league flair. With a mid-balanced swing feel and a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, it delivers impressive pop and extended durability, thanks to its innovative VXP Alloy and ringless barrel construction. The ergonomic handle taper and micro-perforated soft-touch grip enhance control and comfort, making it a top choice for players aiming to elevate their game. Certified with the USSSA 1.15 BPF, this bat combines cutting-edge technology with eye-catching design for a superior on-field experience. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
